name: DomainTools Hosting History
description: Retrieve historical IP address and hosting infrastructure data for a domain from DomainTools API. Track changes in domain hosting over time to identify infrastructure migrations, shared hosting relationships, and patterns for threat analysis

domain.description: The domain name to retrieve hosting history for (e.g., example.com)
The domain name that was queried

ip_history.description: Chronological array of IP addresses where the domain has been hosted, showing infrastructure changes over time
